Module se1.bestellsystem
Package system

Interface RTE.Runtime

Enclosing interface:
RTE
public static interface RTE.Runtime
A Runtime instance represents a running instance of the system. It provides access to system components.

      RTE shutdown(Consumer<RTE.Runtime> runtime) throws RuntimeException
      Shutting down Runtime instance.
      Parameters:
      runtime - functional interface invoked during shutdown.
      Returns:
      Runtime Environment from which Runtime instance was launched.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - thrown with errors during shutdown
